definition: former appearance/what it used to look like
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: He had cleared them out three years ago but they had all come back in again.
sentences.chinese: 祂三年前曾經把他們趕出去，但不久又回覆舊觀。

sentences.english: Some of the outdated ideas of the people make environmental destruction even worse.
sentences.chinese: 人們的一些陳舊觀念使我國環境破壞雪上加霜。

sentences.english: Women bosses have escaped ludicrous stereotypes to become normal.
sentences.chinese: 女老闆脫離了荒誕可笑的陳舊觀念，越發正常化。

sentences.english: Old and new ideas may exist side by side.
sentences.chinese: 新舊觀念可以相輔相成。

sentences.english: Many old buildings in Beijing have been renovated and restored to their former glory (or splendour).
sentences.chinese: 北京許多古建築已經修繕一新，恢復了舊觀。

sentences.english: Her aim is to break through the stereotypes.
sentences.chinese: 她就是要打破人們在這一領域的陳舊觀念。
